modName: Make Inferno - Enhanced and More Realistic Fire
summary:
=* \"Make Inferno\" *=
No more torches? Set something on fire with any of \"fire\" spells you got or make a little Inferno, The flames Lights up like torches and the enemy takes great damage walking through the infernal fire.  it affects and light up every fire spell in the game! Dragons, fireballs, even the flame atronachs! More Realistic Fire.
descriptionHtml:
=* \"Make Inferno\" *=
No more torches? Set something on fire with any of \"fire\" spells you got or make a little Inferno, The flames Lights up like torches and the enemy takes great damage walking through the infernal fire.  it affects and light up every fire spell in the game! Dragons, fireballs, even the flame atronachs! It also affects the Frostbite spell to last longer on the environment. 

*Heads up*
Firetraps in dwemer ruins or firetraps who constant give of fire may cause some FPS-drop on some systems.  

Like the mod? Show some love and vote :)


I recommend to Use this mod with:

* Fire and Ice Overhaul by ApolloDown             
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/43241
(WARNING! Make Inferno with this mod may burn whole Skyrim to the ground)

*  Dragon Combat Overhaul by ApolloDown
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32597

* Nehluxhes - \"[WWL]Illuminated atronachs / Atronachs lumineux\" You can download it here: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=101419466


*** Experiment with the load order on The overhaul mods and make inferno, I load make inferno last of them for more intence fires, If you load make inferno first, you will get the overhaul mods fire. It is Awesome anyway ;) 
If you mod users who want to keep the lighting of their torches the same as the lighting mod settings, Place this before your lighting overhaul mods. ***
===============================================================
author: KennyBall

files.name: Make Inferno
files.changelogHtml: Fixed the \"spiky\" preview Graphical issue with frost/ice spells

files.name: Make Inferno
files.changelogHtml: Now Firespells Will Light YOU and only you when the spell is open in hand, This will make the enemy see you,

files.name: Make Inferno V1_21
files.changelogHtml:
Added 10x the amount of Catapult fires on the ground
Placed A Limit To Fires from unlimited to 150, Perhaps this will solve the Dwemer Flame issue for those of you who get a extreme performance drop when firetraps in dwemer ruins give off constant fire
Fixed minor glitch with the Costs and casting time (auto calculate to the cost & time)
Torch radius set to 800 and time to 480
Cleaned with TES5Edit

files.name: Make Inferno V1_21
files.changelogHtml:
Added 10x the amount of Catapult fires on the ground
Placed A Limit To Fires from unlimited to 150, Perhaps this will solve the Dwemer Flame issue for those of you who get a extreme performance drop when firetraps in dwemer ruins give off constant fire
Fixed minor glitch with the Costs and casting time (auto calculate to the cost & time)
Torch radius set to 800 and time to 480
Cleaned with TES5Edit

files.name: Make Inferno 1_23
files.changelogHtml:
Heavier damage from fire, If you burn you can die. Auto-cost enabled on spells due to the power fire now have more mana cost
Torch light added to fire is down to vanilla setting, due to extremely bright light with a lot of fire, Still insanely bright on Firetraps though
Cleaned with TES5Edit,
If this version is to powerful for you stick with the 1.21 or the optional version.

files.name: make inferno 1_24
files.changelogHtml: I made a new version 1_24 with the fireball explosion fix, and nerfed the magicka Cost a bit, but still more expensive than the vanilla though.
